amendment.description: Amendment reduces, then increase the funding for the Water and Related Resources account by $1 million for the purpose of addressing environmental restoration, specifically the Salton Sea.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase the funding for the Water and Related Resources account by $1 million for the purpose of addressing environmental restoration, specifically the Salton Sea.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
